title: PBE invite doesnt work
body: I got a PBE invite last year but the link never worked/still does not work.  Says page not found.  I still have the email.  Would I be able to get a new link/invite?

replies.body:
PBE signups were reworked last year, those invites will no longer work I don't believe. 

This link should get you going-> https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/pbe
